title: Reflective Practice and Coaching-Based Expert Program for Advanced Instructional Design (ID)

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental instructional design theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing social studies education project design capability enhancement for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex real-world design problems using a reflective practice framework.
Based on coaching feedback, learners can iteratively improve the project design process.
Learners can develop customized instructional design strategies tailored to social sector educational contexts.

resources: Case Database (Social Domain Education Project Samples)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
